query: query {token(limit: 100, offset: 100, order_by: { exchanges_aggregate: {avg: {tezPool: desc}} }, where: {exchanges: {name: {_in: ["lb", "quipuswap"]}}}) {symbol,address,tokenId,exchanges(where: {name: {_in: ["lb", "quipuswap"]}}) {name,tezPool,tokenPool,address,sharesTotal,midPrice,token {address,decimals,symbol,tokenId,standard}}}}
